    • addFormatting

      public Replacement addFormatting(Format... formats)
      Add formatting codes to the replacement. A ยงr will be appended after the replacement. Only provide the formatting character. Without ยง or &.
      Parameters:
      formats - formats which should be applied on the replacement.
      Returns:
      replacement with formatting set
